emails.subject: Great candidate for Senior Advisor role
emails.body:
Hi Team,

I'd like to introduce Sarah Johnson for the Senior Financial Advisor position in Chicago. She has 12 years of experience at Morgan Stanley and is looking for new opportunities.

Best regards,
John

emails.subject: Referral - Michael Chen
emails.body:
Hello,

Michael Chen would be perfect for your Wealth Manager opening in San Francisco. He's currently at Goldman Sachs with 8 years of experience.

Referrer: Lisa Wong

Thanks
